system.requirement: After your service is accepted by a guru who will help you reach enlightenment...

abilities.description: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} and mark experience, you may reflect with your guru on a lesson you learned. If you do, roll +heart. On a hit, you are guided towards enlightenment. Envision how your character changes and take +1 experience as well as +2 momentum. Then add +1 to your next move.

When you take time to receive teaching from your guru and moditate on their words, roll +heart. On a strong hit, choose two. On a weak hit, choose one.

  • Heartened: Clear shaken.
  • Encouraged: Take +1 spirit.
  • Inspired: Take +1 momentum.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel} by sharing the teachings of your guru, you may roll +wits (instead of +heart). Then add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
